title: The Match, Diva Wide Receivers, Tom Brady & Colin Right, Colin Wrong
itunes:title: The Match, Diva Wide Receivers, Tom Brady & Colin Right, Colin Wrong
description:
Colin explains why golf needs to be more like The Match with Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson, Tom Brady and Peyton Manning, why nobody needs to deal with diva wide receivers anymore, how Michigan's President showed us why Jim Harbaugh is doing a great job, why Tom Brady will easily win the divorce with Bill Belichick. Plus, where Colin was right and where Colin was wrong.

Guests Include: Doug Gottlieb, Peter King, Chris Broussard and Bruce Gradkowski.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
